Entries.choseInternet: pause 10/message "凯尔：我找到了你的网上艺术商店……你就不好奇一直买你雕像的“K 先生”吗？"/pause 90/speak Leah "你就是“K 先生”？我……我以为就是以为喜欢我的艺术的富豪呢。$s"/move LeahEx 0 1 2/message "凯尔：嘿嘿。你猜对了一半……"/pause 1000/message "凯尔：莉亚，我想让你回到我身边。我想你了，宝贝。"/emote Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "呕，少肉麻了！$a#$b#你以前从来不支持我的艺术……现在我成功了，你就来找我复合？真恶心。$a"/move Leah 0 2 2/showFrame LeahEx 4/message "凯尔：嘿！过来！"/speed farmer 4/move farmer -2 0 0 false/question fork1 "#朝凯尔脸上打一拳。#和凯尔理论。"/fork noPunch/pause 300/screenFlash .25/animate farmer false false 650 15/positionOffset farmer 0 -8/faceDirection Leah 0 true/playSound clubhit/showFrame LeahEx 6/jump LeahEx/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset farmer 0 8/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/pause 200/playSound clubSmash/showFrame LeahEx 7/shake LeahEx 1000/speak Leah "我的天啊！$6"/speed Leah 4/move Leah -1 0 0/speed Leah 4/move Leah 0 -4 1/emote Leah 40/pause 1700/speak Leah "嗯，他没事……但你这样确实太过暴力了，@。^嗯，她没事……但你这样确实太过暴力了，@。"/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "我们走吧。凯尔不会再打扰我们了。"/speed farmer 2/positionOffset farmer 2 0/move farmer -1 0 0/move Leah 0 -8 0 true/move farmer 0 -8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Leah "我们这次找个更僻静的地方吧……$l"/playMusic none/pause 2000/end dialogue Leah "好吧，野餐没按我预想的那样进行下去。$h"
Entries.noPunch: pause 10/message "凯尔：我跟你没什么好说的。给我滚开。"/speed farmer 2/move farmer 1 0 3/move LeahEx 0 2 2/message "凯尔：说真的，莉亚……你和这个头脑简单的乡巴佬在这里干什么呢？"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Leah 26/pause 1000/showFrame Leah 27/showFrame 94/playSound clubhit/screenFlash .25/showFrame LeahEx 6/jump LeahEx/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset farmer 0 8/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/positionOffset LeahEx 0 -4/pause 25/pause 200/playSound clubSmash/showFrame LeahEx 7/shake LeahEx 1000/stopAnimation farmer/speak Leah "@的各个方面都比你优秀多了！$a^@的各个方面都比你优秀多了！$a#$b#你赶紧滚吧，不要再回来了！$a"/move Leah -1 0 0/move Leah 0 -4 1/speak Leah "走吧，@。凯尔不会再打扰我们了。"/move farmer 0 1 2/faceDirection Leah 2 true/move farmer -2 0 0/move Leah 0 -11 0 true/move farmer 0 -11 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/speak Leah "我们这次找个更僻静的地方吧……$l"/playMusic none/pause 2000/end dialogue Leah "好吧，野餐没按我预想的那样进行下去。$h"
Entries.181928/f Penny 2000/t 900 1600/w sunny/G: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 75 40 2 Penny 71 45 2 Jas 71 49 3 Vincent 70 49 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyFieldTrip/positionOffset Penny 0 -16/animate Jas false true 90 16 17 18 19/viewport 71 45 true/move farmer 0 5 3/pause 600/faceDirection Penny 1/pause 600/speak Penny "@！你来得正好。"/emote farmer 8/speak Penny "我要带孩子们去郊外农场进行一次小小的户外教学。#$b#你对乡下生活很了解吧？$h"/speak Penny "$q -1 null#所以我就想……今天你能当我们的演讲嘉宾吗？#$r -1 10 event_speaker_yes#我很乐意。#$r -1 0 event_speaker_yes#当然。#$r -1 -1500 event_speaker_no#不……我受不了小孩。"/fork eventEnd/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Penny 26/pause 500/shake Penny 500/speak Penny "贾斯！文森特！听我说！"/pause 80/stopAnimation Jas/faceDirection Jas 0 true/faceDirection Vincent 0/jump Vincent/jump Jas/pause 800/speed Vincent 4/speed Jas 4/move Vincent 0 -3 0 true/move Jas 0 -3 0 true/showFrame Penny 0/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "我要为你们介绍一位特别嘉宾……我们本地的农夫，@。#$b#他对农村生活有着切身的体会……他对谷里的“自然资源”了如指掌！^她对农村生活有着切身的体会……她对谷里的“自然资源”了如指掌！"/pause 500/speak Penny "有人能告诉我什么是“自然资源”吗？"/animate Jas false true 50 20 21/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 1200/speak Penny "贾斯？"/stopAnimation Vincent/stopAnimation Jas/speak Jas "自然资源就是在自然状态下演化形成的物质资源储藏，有经济价值。$4"/faceDirection Vincent 1/speak Penny "很好！这个回答可以奖励两颗星，贾斯。"/speak Jas "好耶！$h"/faceDirection Vincent 0/speak Penny "接下来，我们有请@说几句。"/move Penny -1 0 1/move farmer -4 0 2/question fork0 "#乡村生活全在于耕种。#乡村生活全在于从野外获得馈赠。"/fork choseFarming/pause 500/question fork0 "#这座山谷充满了珍贵的矿物。#这里的水域里生活着许许多多新鲜的海鲜。#你在格兰普顿南部找不出比这里更好的木材。"/fork choseMinerals/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "@先生，你会娶潘妮老师吗？$s^@女士……呃，你有男朋友吗？"/speak Penny "文森特！这问题太无礼了！注意你自己的言行，否则我就收回你今天所有的星星。$a"/emote Vincent 28/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
Entries.choseFarming: pause 500/question fork0 "#山谷的土壤非常适合种植蔬菜。#山谷的空气和青草很适合放牧。"/fork choseAnimals/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "呃，@？如果我吃了你的蔬菜，我会长得像我哥哥山姆一样壮吗？#$b#他好壮啊，昨晚他和潘妮老师要爬上一棵树的时候，还把她整个抬起来了呢。$h"/showFrame Penny 27/jump Penny/pause 800/showFrame Penny 0/faceDirection farmer 3 true/emote Penny 12/speak Penny "文森特！别乱讲！$a"/switchEvent fieldTripEnd/
Entries.choseAnimals: pause 500/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "@？我能在您的奶牛身上套一个鞍然后骑着它到镇里吗？我想成为一个真正的牛仔！"/speak Penny "文森特！注意自己的言行！@先生要靠农场为生呢！农场可不是你的游乐场。$h^文森特！注意自己的言行！@小姐要靠农场为生呢！农场可不是你的游乐场。$h"/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
Entries.choseMinerals: pause 500/animate Vincent false true 50 16 17/playSound dwop/pause 300/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/stopAnimation Vincent/speak Penny "文森特？"/speak Vincent "@？山洞真的住着哥布林吗……它们真的会吃小孩吗？"/jump Jas/pause 800/faceDirection Jas 3/emote Jas 28/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/speak Penny "文森特！你吓到贾斯了。我们别聊怪物的事情了。$a"/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection Jas 0/emote Penny 12/pause 400/stopAnimation farmer/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 40/faceDirection Penny 2/faceDirection farmer 2/switchEvent fieldTripEnd
Entries.fieldTripEnd: pause 400/emote Penny 40/speak Penny "嗯，今天差不多就这样吧。你俩去玩吧。"/speed Jas 4/move Jas 0 3 1/speed Jas 4/move Jas 9 0 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/jump Vincent/pause 800/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 0 3 1 false/speed Vincent 4/move Vincent 9 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 2/faceDirection Jas 2/faceDirection Penny 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak Penny "照顾这些孩子很累……$u#$b#但我不介意。我喜欢看着他们学习……我也希望能帮他们成长为优秀的人。"/faceDirection Penny 2/pause 500/faceDirection Penny 1/speak Penny "$q -1 null#你想过要孩子吗，@？#$r -1 0 event_speaker_kids1#我还没认真想过。#$r -1 20 event_speaker_kids2#那当然，我想要很多孩子。#$r -1 20 event_speaker_kids3#有吧，这是人的本能愿望。#$r -1 10 event_speaker_kids4#没有，我觉得我不适合。#$r -1 -10 event_speaker_kids5#不想，这个世界的人已经够多了。#$r -1 -10 event_speaker_kids6#不想，我不想被家庭束缚。"/viewport move 1 0 10000/pause 7000/stopMusic/globalFade/viewport -2000 -2000/speak Penny "那好吧，我很高兴你能来，@。孩子们玩得很开心。$h"/end dialogue Penny "谢谢你让我们度过了一个有意义的户外教学。"
Entries.eventEnd: faceDirection Penny 3/emote Penny 12/end dialogue Penny "真不敢相信你居然拒绝帮我。$a"
Entries.318560/j 10/t 900 1600/d Tue Wed Fri Sat: communityCenter/94 99/farmer 98 88 2 Jas 95 100 3 Vincent 93 100 1/playMusic communityCenter/skippable/move farmer 0 6 2 true/pause 1000/speak Jas "呃……好难闻。$s"/pause 600/jump Vincent/pause 500/faceDirection Vincent 0/pause 500/showFrame Vincent 16/shake Vincent 400/playSound clank/pause 800/shake Vincent 400/playSound clank/pause 800/showFrame Vincent 8/speak Vincent "……$s#$b#怎么锁上了？我还想去下水道里探索一番呢！$s"/pause 800/faceDirection Jas 0/pause 800/speak Jas "钥匙应该在冈瑟手里。"/pause 300/faceDirection Vincent 1/speak Vincent "冈瑟教授？开博物馆的那个？你为什么会觉得钥匙在他手里？$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Jas 3/speak Jas "有一次，我见到一把生锈的大钥匙从他的口袋里掉了出来。#$b#这种瘆人的下水道大门一定得配一把生锈的旧钥匙。$4"/playMusic none/pause 2000/playSound slimeHit/pause 400/playSound slimeHit/pause 400/playSound slimeHit/pause 500/emote Vincent 8 true/emote Jas 8 true/pause 900/faceDirection Vincent 0 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/pause 1600/playSound shadowpeep/shake Vincent 5000/shake Jas 5000/jump Jas/jump Vincent/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Vincent 0 true/faceDirection Jas 0 true/pause 1500/playSound shadowDie/jump Vincent/jump Jas/pause 800/speed Vincent 6/speed Jas 6/advancedMove Jas false 4 0 0 -7 -1 0/advancedMove Vincent false 6 0 0 -8 -1 0/proceedPosition Vincent 98 92/faceDirection farmer 0 true/faceDirection Jas 2 true/faceDirection Vincent 2 true/speak Jas "里面有东西在动！$u"/shake Jas 4000/shake Vincent 4000/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/move farmer 0 6 3 false/move farmer -4 0 0/pause 800/emote farmer 40/pause 1600/playSound shadowpeep/faceDirection farmer 2 true/jump farmer/showFrame 94/jump Vincent/jump Jas/speed Jas 4/speed Vincent 4/move Jas 0 -6 0 true/move Vincent 0 -6 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.611944/f Shane 500/t 2000 2400: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 33 18 2 Shane 34 25 2/skippable/addLantern 735 35 25 1/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/viewport 34 25 true/move farmer 0 7 2/pause 2000/speak Shane "已经很晚了哈？"/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 20/pause 1000/speak Shane "给，来杯冰啤吧。"/pause 500/showFrame Shane 25/pause 1000/playSound coin/showFrame 90/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 20/pause 5000/showFrame Shane 20/speak Shane "哈……人生啊。"/playMusic echos/pause 4000/speak Shane "你有没有这种感觉……无论你做什么都会失败？#$b#……就好像你陷入痛苦的深渊无法自拔，看不到一点光芒？"/pause 2000/speak Shane "我感觉不管我多努力……我都无法强大到从那个洞里爬出来。"/pause 3000/farmerEat 346/pause 4000/speak Shane "嘿……喝挺快啊？是条汉子。^嘿……喝挺快啊？真是女中豪杰。#$b#不过别上瘾了……你还有大好年华呢。"/pause 3000/stopAnimation Shane/showFrame Shane 19/speak Shane "哎哟……我的肝已经给我发警报了。那就晚安了。#$b#回头见，@。"/move Shane 0 -6 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.3910975/f Shane 1500/e 3910674/t 900 200: echos/-2000 -2000/farmer 83 92 2 Shane -3000 -3000 2 Harvey -3000 -3000 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite shaneCliffs/viewport 83 99 clamp true/pause 1000/move farmer 0 5 2/pause 500/speak Shane "……$7#$b#@……$7"/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 4/pause 1000/speak Shane "对……对不起……*打嗝*$7#$b#……$7#$b#我……我的人生……$7#$b#是个可悲的笑话……$7#$b#看看我……$7#$b#……$7#$b#我为什么要挣扎呢？……*啜泣*$7#$b#我根本掌控不了自己的人生……$7#$b#我只是……风中摇曳的一片垃圾……*打嗝*$7#$b#……$7#$b#我最近经常来这里……往下看……$7#$b#我掌握自己人生的最后一个方式……就是这悬崖……$7#$b#……$7#$b#但……但……*打嗝*……但是我太害怕，太焦虑。就像平时一样…… $7"/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 0/pause 2000/speak Shane "@……我只能通过工作，睡觉，吃喝……来……自我麻痹。$7#$b#为什么我还要继续？告诉我……求……求你告诉我还有什么理由不直接跳下去……$7"/pause 1000/showFrame farmer 0/pause 1000/question shaneCliffs "#因为还有太多活下去的理由！#贾斯需要你。对她来说，你就像她的父亲。#因为这将会是一种罪恶。#这取决于你自己。无论如何，我都会在你身边。"/pause 500/pause 500/pause 500/pause 1000/speak Shane "@……$7"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 4/pause 1000/speak Shane "……我想你应该带我去医院了。$7"/pause 500/showFrame farmer 0/jump farmer/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/changeLocation Hospital/warp farmer 16 7/playMusic Hospital_Ambient/warp Harvey 16 6/faceDirection farmer 0/specificTemporarySprite shaneHospital/viewport 16 6 true/pause 2000/speak Harvey "……我帮他洗了胃并且为他补充了水分。他会好起来的。#$b#总之，很庆幸你及时把他送到医院。"/faceDirection Harvey 1/emote Harvey 28/speak Harvey "过量的酒精对他的身体造成极大负担……但是现在我更担心的是他的心理健康……$s#$b#当他醒来时，我会和他聊聊关于他的治疗方案。我认识一个祖祖城的优秀心理医生……"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Harvey "有时，生活会很痛苦……#$b#但是未来总是充满美好和希望的。你得学会相信它。"/pause 2000/end invisible Shane

Entries.11/f Haley 500/p Haley/p Emily: 50s/6 20/farmer -10 -10 0 Haley 5 20 1 Emily 8 20 3/skippable/pause 1000/shake Haley 500/pause 500/speak Haley "呃啊啊！老是我打扫坐垫下面！这周轮到你了！$a"/emote Emily 12/speak Emily "你真孩子气，海莉。这房子里大部分的家务都是我做的，你心知肚明。$u"/pause 200/warp farmer 2 24/playSound doorClose/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 2/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Haley "哦，是那个新来的农场男孩。$7^哦，是那个新来的农场女孩。$7"/faceDirection Emily 3/speak Emily "他有名字的。$u^她有名字的。$u"/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 3 0 0/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Haley "嘿，你会理解我的。"/emote farmer 8/speak Emily "*叹气*……抱歉把你牵扯进来了，@。海莉在抱怨我让她打扫坐垫下面。$u"/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "$q 45 null#那是因为上周是我打扫的！$a#$r 46 -50 Event_clean2#少废话，赶紧打扫！#$r 45 30 Event_clean1#海莉，为什么不每周固定打扫一次呢？#$r 46 -30 Event_clean3#艾米丽，你该大度一点，这次就去打扫吧。"/fork haleyWontDoIt/stopMusic/faceDirection Haley 3/emote Haley 12/pause 400/faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "好吧，你赢了。不出意外这就成了我每周的工作了。然后就不用再争吵了。$u"/faceDirection Haley 2/speak Emily "非常感谢，@。圆满解决了呢。$h"/pause 1000/end

Entries.195019/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 19 1 Haley 18 18 1 Emily 19 17 2 Penny 20 17 2 Maru 21 17 2 Leah 22 18 3 Abigail 20 20 0/pause 1000/message "不知怎的，你决定把手放到口袋里……"/pause 500/message "你摸着兔子的脚，感觉如释重负……"/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 17 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Haley 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection Maru 3 true/faceDirection Leah 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3 true/textAboveHead Haley "嗨！"/textAboveHead Abigail "嘿！"/textAboveHead Leah "看谁来了！"/pause 2000/move farmer 4 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Abigail "我们刚才在聊刘易斯镇长和玛妮的八卦……$h"/pause 500/speak Penny "我个人觉得他们之间没有什么猫腻……"/pause 500/speak Haley "哈！你太天真了吧？$h"/jump Penny/emote Penny 12/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "你和这群女孩待了一会儿。"/pause 1000/message "这次聚会无事发生！"/pause 500/end
Entries.195012/f Haley 2500/f Emily 2500/f Penny: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 8 19 1 Haley 18 18 1 Emily 19 17 2 Penny 20 17 2 Maru 21 17 2 Leah 22 18 3 Abigail 20 20 0 Pierre -1000 -1000 1/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 17 19 true/move false/pause 500/startJittering/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame farmer 0/stopJittering/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame farmer 7 true/startJittering/faceDirection Haley 3 true/faceDirection Emily 3 true/faceDirection Penny 3 true/faceDirection Maru 3 true/faceDirection Leah 3 true/faceDirection Abigail 3 true/textAboveHead Haley "别想跑！"/textAboveHead Abigail "别动！"/textAboveHead Leah "站住！"/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Abigail "呵，没想到你所有的“女朋友”会出现在一个房间里吧，@？$a"/pause 500/speak Leah "我……我还以为你和其他人不一样……$s^你骗取了我们所有人的爱……你真是太可怕了……$a"/pause 500/speak Penny "你怎么能这样对我们，@？$s"/pause 500/speak Maru "你真觉得自己能瞒天过海，是吗？觉得每种“小点心”都可以尝一口？真是个花心大萝卜……$a"/pause 500/speak Emily "那……那天晚上在帐篷里……黑暗中你在我耳边轻声说了那么多甜言蜜语……$s#$b#原来一切都是谎言，现在知道真相的我该如何面对每一天。$s"/pause 500/playMusic ragtime/speak Haley "好了，我们女人要团结起来！我们不能忍受这种事情！$a^我们不会再忍受你的伤害了！$a"/textAboveHead Leah "没错！"/pause 500/speak Abigail "嗯？你还有什么要为自己辩解的？$a"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#对不起……我错了。#女士们，冷静一下！我可以解释……"/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/textAboveHead Maru "哼……"/pause 500/speak Abigail "说得好听，但这事不能就这么算了……$u"/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Haley "……我们已经决定了……对吗，姐妹们？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "……是的。$s"/speak Leah "当然。$a"/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我们都要疏远你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 3/end warpOut
Entries.choseToExplain: pause 100/textAboveHead Haley "我深表怀疑……"/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 "#我认为我们只是朋友！我不知道事情这么严重！#皮埃尔向我施压！他想卖出更多花束！#女士们，这再正常不过了！这只是生活方式的一种选择……"/pause 100/fork lifestyleChoice/textAboveHead Haley "骗子！"/textAboveHead Maru "对，没错！"/speak Emily "你真以为我们会相信吗？你给自己挖了一个更大的坑……$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Haley 2/playMusic none/speak Haley "……我想我们已经决定了……对吗，姐妹们？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "……是的。$s"/speak Leah "当然。$a"/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我们都要疏远你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 4/end warpOut
Entries.lifestyleChoice: pause 100/speak Penny "哼！我不知道在祖祖城什么是“正常”，但我绝对不会接受！$a"/speak Maru "如果我们根本不知道的话，那这就不是“选择”！$a"/pause 100/speak Abigail "你别想这样蒙混过关，@。$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Haley 2/playMusic none/speak Haley "……我想我们已经决定了……对吗，姐妹们？$u"/pause 500/speak Penny "……是的。$s"/speak Leah "当然。$a"/faceDirection Haley 3/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/jump Haley/jump Abigail/jump Emily/jump Leah/jump Maru/jump Penny/pause 1000/speak Maru "我们都要疏远你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump girls 4/end warpOut
Entries.150938/n emilyStones: SunRoom/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Emily 15 18 2 Haley 12 18 2 Abigail 14 20 2 Caroline 13 20 2 Marnie 16 20 2/skippable/positionOffset Haley 0 32/showFrame Emily 54/showFrame Marnie 35/showFrame Haley 34/hideShadow Haley true/showFrame Abigail 53/showFrame Caroline 24/addObject 14 21 66 1/addObject 16 21 70/addObject 12 19 68 1/addObject 15 19 64 1/addObject 13 21 60 1/viewport 14 19 true/pause 4000/speak Emily "好的……大家都拿到石头了。#$b#来，闭上双眼，然后慢慢地深呼吸。集中注意力到你的胸腔。"/pause 3000/speak Emily "想象有纯净的能量随着呼吸流进身体中。#$b#呼气的时候，感受到压力和负能量流动出去，每次呼吸都变得更加轻松。"/pause 3000/speak Emily "然后，用心去呼应石头的振动频率。感受到什么了？"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Abigail "没有。"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Marnie "我有！"/pause 2000/textAboveHead Caroline "很轻松"/pause 4000/emote Haley 24/pause 1000/emote Haley 24 true/viewport move 1 -1 7000/pause 4000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "看来宝石有很不错的效果……"/end

Entries.normal: pause 400/speak Harvey "抱歉，我邋里邋遢的……我不知道你要过来。$h"/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 600/speak Harvey "嘿，我好像听见了飞机声……"/move Harvey 0 1 3/move Harvey -3 0 0/move Harvey 0 -2 0/speak Harvey "@，快过来！"/move farmer 0 -1 3/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Harvey "快看！"/globalFade/cutscene plane/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Harvey "我从小就梦想成为一名飞行员"/pause 1000/speak Harvey "但因为我视力不好，而且极度恐高，这个梦想已经渐渐暗淡了。$s"/faceDirection Harvey 3/faceDirection farmer 1/viewport 5 6 true/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/speak Harvey "没事的……不用伤心。#$b#我长大了，能接受自己人生的定位了。不是所有人都能实现梦想的……世界就是这样的。"/pause 1600/speak Harvey "嘿，你来看看我的飞机模型。我刚刚完成新的 TR-星鸟豪华版。$h"/advancedMove Harvey false 0 2 4 0/faceDirection farmer 2/end

Entries.7/f Maru 1000/p Maru: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer -10000 -10000 0 Maru 9 15 3 Harvey 7 10 0/skippable/changeSprite Maru Hospital/changePortrait Maru Hospital/showFrame Maru 18/viewport 10 15/pause 4000/speak Maru "*叹气*……我真受够了准备样本……$s"/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 10 19/pause 100/playSound throw/showFrame Maru 17/shake Maru 2000/jump Maru/specificTemporarySprite maruBeaker/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 1250/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 100/speak Maru "啊！糟糕！$4"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 16/pause 1000/speak Maru "整份样本都被毁了……哈维会杀了我的……$s"/pause 600/showFrame Maru 0/faceDirection Maru 0/pause 1500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 400/speak Maru "$q 38 null#@我应该怎么办？#$r 38 -50 Event_Hospital_1#从地板上铲起来就好。他不会发现的。#$r 39 -20 Event_Hospital_2#告诉哈维是我的错。#$r 38 50 Event_Hospital_3#告诉哈维，这纯属意外。"/move Harvey 3 0 2/move Harvey 0 2 2/doAction 10 13/move Harvey 0 1 2/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Harvey "发生什么了？我听到东西打碎的声音。"/pause 500/speak Maru "$p 38#我不小心摔碎了一份样本……真是对不起。$s|@进来后猛地一关门，吓得我打碎了一份样本。$u"/fork toldTruth/move Harvey 0 2 3/emote Harvey 40/speak Harvey "玛鲁，你不能把自己的问题推卸到别人身上。$a"/pause 300/faceDirection Harvey 1/speak Harvey "*叹气*……我只好让病人再来采集一次样本了。$s#$b#这很可能会害得我们又亏损一个月……$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1000/showFrame Maru 16/pause 500/emote farmer 28/end

Entries.18/f George 1500/p George: sadpiano/17 17/farmer 10 19 1 George 18 17 0/skippable/emote George 12/speak George "不行……够不到！$u#$b#要是我能从这该死的椅子上站起来……$s"/move farmer 4 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 500/showFrame 15/pause 500/pause 500/playSound Ship/pause 500/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection George 3/showFrame 35/pause 500/playSound coin/pause 300/stopAnimation farmer/pause 500/speak George "谢谢你，小伙子。^谢谢你，小姐。"/pause 800/speed George 1/faceDirection George 2/pause 500/move George 0 1 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak George "*叹气*……那是 30 年前的事。$s#$b#我当时在煤矿里上班。我们马上就要换班了，但还剩最后一个煤层需要爆破。#$b#我拿着一支炸药，要去引爆，但我绊了一下。炸药掉在地上，爆炸了。"/pause 800/speak George "等我再醒过来的时候，就已经躺在医院里了……然后他们告诉我，我再也不能走路了。"/faceDirection George 3/speak George "你明白了吧。你可能觉得我是因为太老所以不能走路的吧。#$b#如果不是那场意外，现在我的腿脚肯定比年轻人还灵活！"/faceDirection George 2/speak George "……"/move farmer 0 1 1/pause 1700/speak George "你对我真的不错，小伙子。我很感激。^你对我真的不错，小姐。我很感激。#$b#等你老了，就会开始忘记有人还在关心你。"/pause 800/faceDirection George 3/pause 1000/end
Entries.19/f Evelyn 1000/p Evelyn: jaunty/3 17/farmer 8 19 3 Evelyn 3 17 0/skippable/move farmer -5 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Evelyn 2/speak Evelyn "噢！@！你是不是在想这阵香味儿是从哪儿飘来的啊？#$b#哈哈，你真会说话！我其实正在烤我的招牌饼干！$h"/emote farmer 16/speak Evelyn "给，尝尝味道怎么样？"/faceDirection Evelyn 0/pause 600/playSound clank/pause 600/faceDirection Evelyn 2/pause 900/farmerEat 223/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Evelyn "$q 51 null#你觉得如何？#$r 51 100 Event_cookies1#很美味！#$r 51 -100 Event_cookies2#就像在嚼冰球"/playMusic none/speak Evelyn "既然我们已经这么熟了，就把我的配方给你吧。但是你要保守秘密。$h"/playSound reward/message "已学会制作“饼干”"/addCookingRecipe Cookies/end
Entries.21/f Alex 1250/p Alex: sadpiano/12 5/farmer 10 11 0 Alex 13 5 0/skippable/pause 500/speak Alex "*叹气*$s"/doAction 10 9/move farmer 0 -5 1/move farmer 3 0 0/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 600/speak Alex "哦，嗨，@。$s"/faceDirection Alex 0/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/emote farmer 8/pause 500/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "瞧瞧这些书啊。我一本都没读过。光是想到要把书翻开，就让我焦虑得不行。$s#$b#但在这个世上，没有文化，就过不上好日子……$s"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "$q 57 null#我真没用……$s#$r 57 0 Event_books1#才不是。你明明是个天才！#$r 57 50 Event_books2#我们都有自己的长处和短处。#$r 57 -50 Event_books3#没用？对，总结得很精辟。"/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 1000/emote Alex 16/speak Alex "好吧，我不会放弃！$a"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "有志者事竟成！"/jump farmer/pause 800/speak Alex "嘿，说不定我们很快就能一边吃饭一边讨论……则、哲、哲学。你们聪明人经常谈论的就是这个吧？$h"/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopAnimation farmer/end
Entries.2119820/f Alex 1500/p Alex: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer 10 10 0 Alex 13 6 2/skippable/showFrame Alex 28/animate Alex false true 100 28 29 30 31 32 32 31 30 29 28/viewport 13 6 true/pause 6500/stopAnimation Alex/pause 1000/doAction 10 9/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 2 0 0/showFrame Alex 34 true/animate Alex false false 100 28 33 34/pause 600/speak Alex "噢！嘿……我正在进行日常体能锻炼。$6#$b#……抱歉，我没有穿衬衫。$6"/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "呃……@？我有件事儿想和你说……$8"/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/speak Alex "我已经开始意识到……那个，我以前对你太粗鲁了。就是关于去职业队的事情。$8"/pause 1000/showFrame Alex 33/pause 1000/speak Alex "我想我其实不是做专业运动员的料……或许那只是我幼稚的幻想……你说呢？$8#$b#总之……我想为我的夸夸其谈和喋喋不休，向你道歉。谢谢你不生我的气，还把我当作朋友。$6"/move farmer 1 0 0/pause 1000/jump farmer/pause 800/showFrame Alex 34/pause 800/emote Alex 32/pause 1200/showFrame Alex 29/pause 100/showFrame Alex 28/pause 100/showFrame Alex 29/pause 100/animate Alex false true 50 30 31 32 32 31 30/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.56/f Harvey 500/p George: jaunty/16 18/farmer 9 24 0 George 16 18 1 Harvey 15 18 1/skippable/move farmer 0 -4 1/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Harvey "好，乔治。我要你深吸一口气。"/pause 700/speak Harvey "嗯……请转过身来。"/pause 300/faceDirection George 2/faceDirection George 3/speak Harvey "乔治，我跟你说实话吧。你如果想健康长寿的话，就得改改你的生活方式。#$b#你得减少食盐的摄入量，并且适量锻炼一下你的手臂。"/emote George 12/speak George "哼……我知道怎么做最好。你以为你是谁啊，敢对我的生活指手画脚？"/pause 500/speak Harvey "你问我是谁……我是你的医生，乔治。#$b#而我学了 8 年医，就是为了帮人们保持健康。"/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 5 0 0/faceDirection Harvey 2 true/faceDirection George 2/speak Harvey "噢！#$b#对不起，你不能待在这里……检查时闲人免进。"/faceDirection farmer 3/speak George "别着急！我还要再听听这个年轻人的意见。^别着急！我还要再听听这位年轻女士的意见。"/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Harvey "那好……"/speak Harvey "$q 84 null#@，你觉得乔治该怎么做？#$r 84 40 event_george1 friend_George_-20#乔治应该听从哈维医生的建议。#$r 85 -40 event_george2 friend_George_40#乔治知道怎么做对他的身体最好。"/faceDirection Harvey 1/faceDirection George 2/emote George 28/speak George "好。我就照你说的做，医生。"/pause 500/faceDirection Harvey 2/speak Harvey "$p 84#谢谢你的帮助，@。我很感激。$h|你最好不要误导我的病人，@。请你以后记住这一点。"/end

Entries.50/f Leah 500/p Leah: breezy/9 8/farmer -50 -50 0 Leah 3 7 3/skippable/animate Leah false true 100 16 17 18 19 19 19 19 16/pause 100/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/warp farmer 7 9/playSound woodyStep/playSound doorClose/pause 300/stopAnimation Leah/pause 300/faceDirection Leah 1 true/emote Leah 16/speak Leah "啊，你好，@！快进来，快进来。"/move farmer 0 -2 3/faceDirection Leah 1/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 500/speak Leah "我正在加工这座雕像。"/pause 300/speak Leah "过来看看吧。"/pause 300/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer 0 -1 0/move farmer -1 0 2/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/animate Leah false true 100 16 17 18 19 19 19 19 16/pause 100/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 600/stopAnimation Leah/showFrame Leah 19/speak Leah "看到了吗？我正在揭示木头的本质。"/pause 500/showFrame Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "$q -1 null#等剥去了外层之后，真实的本性才开始展现……#$r -1 0 event_sculpt1#人也是这样。#$r -1 0 event_sculpt2#我其实更喜欢未经雕琢的木头。#$r -1 -100 event_sculpt3#（唐突）我能亲你一下吗？"/fork creepySexualPass/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 1500/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "我第一次和父母来这座山谷度假的时候，还是个小姑娘。#$b#我知道，总有一天我会回来……这个地方充满了艺术气息！"/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/emote Leah 28/speak Leah "但我得承认……作为艺术家，想要养活自己可不容易。$s"/pause 1000/emote farmer 16/faceDirection Leah 0/question fork1 "#你为啥不在镇上举办一个艺术展呢？#你为啥不把你的作品放在网上出售啊？"/fork internet/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "嗯……有意思。我觉得这也许能让鹈鹕镇变成真正的艺术之乡……$7"/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 700/speak Leah "但如果没人喜欢我的雕像呢？那我就完了。$s"/pause 500/speak Leah "我得考虑一下。$s"/faceDirection Leah 0/speak Leah "好吧，感谢你的拜访，@。"/pause 600/move farmer 4 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/addMailReceived LeahArtShowSuggestion/end dialogueWarpOut Leah "为全村举办一次艺术展？真是个大胆的主意，@。"
Entries.internet: speak Leah "嗯……是个不错的主意……但我得先搞台电脑。$7"/addMailReceived LeahInternet/faceDirection Leah 3/emote Leah 28/pause 500/speak Leah "而且……电脑可不便宜啊。$s"/pause 1000/speak Leah "好吧，感谢你的拜访……"/pause 600/move farmer 4 0 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.creepySexualPass: stopMusic/faceDirection farmer 2/speed Leah 4/move Leah 1 0 0/speed Leah 4/move Leah 0 -1 3/animate Leah false false 100 16 17 18 19/pause 100/playSound ow/playSound clubhit/animate farmer false false 1200 94/positionOffset farmer -8 0/pause 50/positionOffset farmer 8 0/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/pause 100/end dialogueWarpOut Leah "……$a"
Entries.51/f Leah 1000/p Leah: sadpiano/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 9 0 Leah 13 8 0/skippable/showFrame Leah 20/changeMapTile Front 14 7 1453/viewport 12 8/move farmer 0 -1 1/speak Leah "凯尔……还要我跟你说多少次？我不想回城里去！$8#$b#别再给我打电话了……我再也不想听到你的声音了！*挂断*$8"/playSound openBox/faceDirection Leah 1/changeMapTile Front 14 7 1454/emote Leah 12/pause 1000/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "@……$6"/pause 300/emote Leah 28/speak Leah "我猜你听到我对着电话大喊大叫了？$s"/faceDirection Leah 2/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 1000/playMusic desolate/speak Leah "那是我的前任……$s"/faceDirection Leah 3/emote farmer 16/pause 600/speak Leah "我最好还是稍微和你解释一下吧……$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 2/pause 500/speak Leah "我们一起在城里租了一间公寓。$u#$b#我白天要打零工，晚上则要通宵制作艺术品……我们的收入只够勉强度日。$u#$b#他一直在唠叨我，要我回学校，去学习财务或是医学……那些能挣钱的职业。$a^她一直在唠叨我，要我回学校，去学习财务或是医学……那些能挣钱的职业。$a#$b#我觉得那是一般人的活法。你知道的……就是在郊区买房、生孩子、开家长会……之类的事情。$u"/faceDirection Leah 3/speak Leah "我还没有过那种生活的打算，@……我必须离开那里。所以我才会来这儿，追寻成为艺术家的梦想。"/pause 900/faceDirection Leah 2/speak Leah "$q 83 null#我是不是太自私了，@？$s#$r 83 0 event_parents1#不，你只是做了必须做的事情。#$r 83 0 event_parents2#不，是你的前任太蠢了。#$r 83 -20 event_parents3#不，但你其实应该待在城里。#$r 83 -20 event_parents4#对，有那么一点儿。#$r 83 -20 event_parents5#对，但先己后人是很正常的。"/faceDirection Leah 3/fork angry/pause 200/fork LeahInternet internet2/fork LeahArtShowSuggestion artShowSuggest/speak Leah "好吧，感谢你能听我说完。有朋友的感觉真好。"/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogueWarpOut Leah "嘿，谢谢你刚才那么耐心地倾听。"
Entries.584059/f Leah 2000/p Leah/n LeahInternet: breezy/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 9 0 Leah 12 10 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite leahLaptop/showFrame Leah 28/positionOffset Leah 0 12/viewport 11 9/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 4 0 2/showFrame Leah 29/speak Leah "嘿！看这个。"/pause 500/showFrame Leah 28/move farmer 0 2 2/pause 400/speak Leah "我买了一台笔记本电脑，在网上开了个艺术品商店……就像你建议的那样。"/pause 800/playSound Pickup_Coin15/showFrame Leah 29/pause 400/speak Leah "你听到了吗？这代表刚刚有人买了件东西！$h"/showFrame Leah 28/emote Leah 40/speak Leah "嗯……就是这个“K 先生”一直在买我的雕像。$7#$b#我想他一定是个有钱人，刚好又很喜欢我的作品。"/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 300/emote Leah 16/speak Leah "哇！售出那个之后，我暂时不用为我的电费账单发愁了……$6"/pause 800/showFrame Leah 29/speak Leah "话说……感谢你给我出的这个主意，@。目前来看，这确实是个大成功！这样我就有钱去进行全职的艺术创作了。$h"/showFrame Leah 28/speak Leah "对不起，我要失陪一下……我得先整整这些 CSS 表单……$7"/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 1000/playSound Pickup_Coin15/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.angry: emote Leah 12/faceDirection Leah 1/speak Leah "……抱歉。我不该发火。$s"/emote Leah 40/speak Leah "或许你是对的……如果我留在那里，生活应该容易得多。$u#$b#也许还是现实一点儿的好……在我看来，我的艺术生涯永远不会成功，最后我只能在悲惨的境遇中结束自己的一生。$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Leah 3/pause 500/speak Leah "好吧，感谢你能听我说完。有朋友的感觉真好。"/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.internet2: pause 50/speak Leah "我一直在存钱买电脑……然后我就能按照你的建议，在网上出售我的作品了。"/emote farmer 32/speak Leah "有朋友关心，真是太好了！"/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
Entries.artShowSuggest: pause 50/speak Leah "话说……我一直在考虑你说的那个开艺术展的事情。#$b#我正在制作几尊新的雕像，想在艺术展上展出……我很紧张，但想到能展示自己的作品我又好兴奋。#$b#很高兴你愿意和我一起把星露谷打造成一流的艺术之乡，@！$h"/pause 500/end warpOut

Entries.prizeTicketIntro/n completedFirstBillboa: distantBanjo/3 6/farmer -2000 -2000 0 Lewis 1 6 0/skippable/pause 2000/warp farmer 5 11/playSound doorClose/pause 400/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer -3 0 3/pause 400/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 500/emote Lewis 16/speak Lewis "噢，@，你好啊。"/pause 500/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "我刚刚往这台机器里补充了不少的奖品……"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Lewis "这是我想出来的一个新项目，目的在于增进镇民之间的善意……包括你在内！#$b#流程很简单……你在镇上帮助别人的时候，偶尔可以收到一张“兑奖券”。你可以拿到这里兑奖。#$b#会有一些特别奖品哦！$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/faceDirection Lewis 1/emote Lewis 40/speak Lewis "我唯一担心的是有人会只盯着兑奖券，而不是用真心对待同伴……$s"/faceDirection farmer 3/quickQuestion #我挺想帮助他人的。#你说对了，我就是想要奖品。(break)pause 100\emote Lewis 32\speak Lewis "是吗？很高兴听你这么说！$h"(break)pause 50\jump Lewis\pause 500\speak Lewis "原来如此！$u#$b#好吧……这并不是我想听到的，不过你也还算坦诚。"/pause 500/speak Lewis "不管怎样……请你多多关注镇上的“需要帮助”布告栏。这样可以方便你拿到更多兑奖券。#$b#祝你好运。"/pause 500/end

Entries.100162/t 600 2600: MarlonsTheme/21 9/farmer -100 -100 0 Marlon 23 6 2/addQuest 14/skippable/pause 1000/move Marlon 0 2 2/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 4/pause 1000/speak Marlon "唔…… "/pause 500/warp farmer 18 13/playSound stoneStep/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 5 0 0/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 500/speak Marlon "我只是来看看这座古老的矿井。#$b#它已经荒废几十年了。"/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 4/speak Marlon "下面可能还有些不错的矿石。#$b#但这么一个黑漆漆的地方，并且还荒废了这么久……你能在下面找到的恐怕不只有矿石……"/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 0/pause 500/speak Marlon "给，拿着这个。你兴许用得上。"/pause 500/playSound dwop/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 2/itemAboveHead sword/pause 3300/awardFestivalPrize sword/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Marlon "顺便告诉你，我叫马龙。我就在外面经营着探险家公会。#$b#我会关注着你的一举一动。如果你能证明自己，我可能会让你成为会员。"/pause 500/end

Entries.linusWell: pause 100/friendship Linus 250/move Linus 0 1 3/move Linus -2 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection Robin 2/playMusic spring_day_ambient/speak Linus "谢谢，@。我刚才还在担心……我以为你会邀请我和你一起搬去农场！*眨眼*#$b#你知道，我将你视作星露谷中最亲密的朋友……你从来没有试图“纠正”我……即便你无法理解我，你也依然尊重我的生活方式。$h#$b#我真的很感激。"/move Linus -2 0 3/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3/emote farmer 32/speak Linus "啊……你能闻到吗？这是成熟浆果的甜香味……$h"/jump Linus/speed Linus 4/move Linus -4 0 3/move Linus 0 -10 0 true/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/pause 500/speak Robin "噢……多么温馨……$h"/pause 1000/end
Entries.5183338/e 3917666/O Maru/w sunny/t 2200: nightTime/-1000 -1000/farmer 23 29 3 Maru 14 29 3/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap NightSceneMaruMap2 false/bgColor 0 0 0/ambientLight 0 0 0/viewport 14 25 true clamp/pause 1000/move farmer -8 0 3/faceDirection Maru 1/pause 800/showFrame Maru 32/pause 700/showFrame Maru 4/speak Maru "嘿，@。你来得正好……彗星就要出现了。"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Maru "夜色真美好啊，你不觉得吗？"/pause 2000/faceDirection Maru 1/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/speak Maru "还记得我们第一次来观星吗？已经是挺久以前了……"/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "那天晚上我差点就把真正的心意说出来了……但我担心你会拒绝我。"/faceDirection Maru 1/speak Maru "谁知道之后我们这么快就结婚了！$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 20/pause 500/jump Maru/pause 400/speak Maru "哦！要来了……"/faceDirection Maru 3/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame Maru 28/emote Maru 40/pause 1000/textAboveHead Maru "哇哦！"/pause 3000/showFrame Maru 12/move Maru 0 1 0/speak Maru "快看！"/pause 500/move farmer -1 0 3/pause 1000/animate farmer true true 100 35/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/playMusic spaceMusic/warp Maru 15 29/faceDirection Maru 3/cutscene marucomet/pause 1000/viewport 14 25 true clamp/pause 3000/stopAnimation farmer/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Maru "看到彗星之后，按照惯例该许个愿……"/pause 500/quickQuestion 你会许什么愿？#再生一个宝宝#我们能一同变老#挣更多的钱(break)jump Maru\pause 500\speak Maru "哦！我们当然可以去努力一下……$l"\emote Maru 20(break)emote Maru 20\speak Maru "那真是太棒了！$l#$b#我的愿望也是这个。$l"(break)speak Maru "钱？好吧……$s#$b#我觉得这很实际……$8"\emote Maru 28\speak Maru "我的愿望会更浪漫一点……"/pause 2000/animate Maru false true 100 28/animate farmer false true 100 101/positionOffset farmer 16 0/specificTemporarySprite heart 15 29/pause 2000/specificTemporarySprite maruTelescope/viewport move 0 -1 13000/pause 16000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 3000/end newDay
Entries.9333219/O Sebastian/f Sebastian 3500/w r: rain/48 36/farmer 49 31 2 Sebastian 50 36 3/makeInvisible 44 31 5 5/addConversationTopic sebastianFrog 0/skippable/move farmer 0 4 2/faceDirection Sebastian 0/speak Sebastian "嘿，@……很高兴你来了。"/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "灌木丛中有一只受伤的青蛙……我要去救他！"/emote farmer 28/faceDirection Sebastian 0/speak Sebastian "我需要你的帮助。去那边的灌木丛里试试让他朝我这个方向过来。我会在这里等着抓住他。"/pause 500/faceDirection Sebastian 3/move farmer -5 0 2/pause 500/showFrame Sebastian 54/playSound grassyStep/pause 500/speak Sebastian "好……你准备好了吗？"/emote farmer 56/textAboveHead Sebastian "就是现在！"/pause 500/doAction 44 36/pause 1000/doAction 44 36/pause 1000/doAction 44 36/playSound croak/specificTemporarySprite sebastianFrog/pause 10000/playSound coin/showFrame Sebastian 55/jump Sebastian/textAboveHead Sebastian "抓住他了！"/move farmer 5 0 2/move farmer 0 1 1/speak Sebastian "可怜的小家伙……他的腿都伤成这样了。$s"/emote farmer 28/quickQuestion #我们应该怎么做？#我们收养他……#我不认为他能挺过去#让我们护理他，帮助他恢复健康！(break)speak Sebastian "暂时把他带回家吧，让他感觉更舒适些。#$b#我得去了解一下如何照顾青蛙。也许玛妮知道一些。"(break)speak Sebastian "哈……好的，我觉得可以。$h#$b#看来你确实挺喜欢他的……$7"\faceDirection farmer 2 true\jump farmer\showFrame farmer 94\startJittering(break)emote Sebastian 12\speak Sebastian "抱歉，我与你意见不同……我想给这个可怜的小家伙一个机会。"(break)speak Sebastian "我们一定会竭尽所能，但小心现在别跟他有过多的接触……"/pause 300/stopJittering/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/speak Sebastian "我们带他回家吧。"/pause 500/playSound croak/pause 2000/end

Entries.10040609: clubloop/7 4/farmer 7 8 0 MrQi 7 4 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -2 0/pause 3000/speak MrQi "哎呀哎呀……看看是谁找到了我的隐秘核桃房。"/pause 1000/faceDirection MrQi 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection MrQi 2/pause 1000/speak MrQi "实在了不起。#$b#尽管你只需要一小部分核桃就可以在岛上自由地通行，但是你还是决定要更进一步了。#$b#你进入这扇隐藏之门的渴望极为强烈，所以付出超过常人的努力到达了这里。#$b#这份热忱让你出类拔萃，孩子。你拥有特别的能量。"/pause 1000/faceDirection MrQi 3 true/pause 100/faceDirection MrQi 0/pause 500/speak MrQi "话虽如此……#$b#你不会以为挑战就到此为止了吧？#$b#并没有……哈、哈、哈……事实上，挑战才刚刚开始。"/faceDirection MrQi 3 true/pause 40/faceDirection MrQi 2/pause 1000/faceDirection MrQi 3/speak MrQi "在你的左手边有一块看板，上面有一些很有趣的机遇。#$b#这些挑战是我专门为你设计的，它们会让你挑战极限。"/faceDirection MrQi 2/speak MrQi "不过，如果能攻克我的挑战，你会获得一种独特的货币……我称之为“齐钻”。"/pause 400/speak MrQi "记得别把它们放到嘴里，孩子……它们放射性很强。呵、呵、呵……"/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection MrQi 1/speak MrQi "你可以在右手边的机器上用齐钻兑换一些罕见又强大的奖励。"/pause 1000/faceDirection MrQi 2/speak MrQi "听起来是不是很有趣？#$b#是啊……我就感觉像你这样的人会觉得这有意思，特别有意思……"/pause 400/faceDirection MrQi 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection MrQi 0/pause 500/speak MrQi "好了，我还有更重要的事情要做……告辞。"/pause 2000/end

Entries.529952/C: WizardSong/54 36/Wizard 54 36 0 farmer 50 40 1/addQuest 28/skippable/move farmer 1 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 1/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/move farmer 1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 600/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "啊……@。我已经等你很久了。"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 400/speak Wizard "我有告诉过你，我曾经结过婚吗？"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 800/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 800/speak Wizard "对于我这样的人来说，这很奇怪，我知道……但这是事实。"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "我和我前妻一起生活了很多年，直……直到我犯下了一个错误，她离我而去。"/pause 400/faceDirection Wizard 0/speak Wizard "她强烈的愤怒和嫉妒导致她全身变成绿色，开始在乡村上空飞行，诅咒着她在途中见到的一切事物……"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "我担心有无辜的村民成为她黑魔法的受害者，因此我发现后，便封印了那条通往她家里的路……"/move Wizard -1 0 3/speak Wizard "但现在，这条路肯定被解封了……我们分别的时候，她拿走了我的魔法墨水！#$b#我需要取回那墨水！$h#$b#我本会自己完成的，但我……我再也不愿见到她。所以我才需要你的帮忙。"/move Wizard 1 0 0/speak Wizard "为了解封这条通道，你需要一个黑暗护身符。去下水道，找科罗布斯交谈，他应该知道在哪能找到。"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "我全指望你了……如果你能取回我的魔法药水，我承诺我将会给你值得的东西……现在赶紧动身吧！"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame farmer 94/pause 3000/showFrame farmer 0/specificTemporarySprite witchFlyby/pause 4000/end

Entries.40/f Elliott 1000/p Gus/t 1500 2200: playful/11 20/farmer 14 24 0 Elliott -30 -30 0 Clint 18 22 2 Marnie 9 22 3 Pam 7 18 1 Lewis 8 22 1 Pierre 4 22 2 Demetrius 3 23 1 Gus 14 18 2 Emily 16 18 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -3 3/faceDirection Pierre 1 true/move farmer -3 0 0/faceDirection Pierre 2 true/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Marnie 0 true/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "嗨。我马上就来给您点单。"/faceDirection Gus 2/move Emily 2 0 1/faceDirection Marnie 3 true/pause 800/move Emily -2 0 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Clint 3 true/move Emily 2 0 1/warp Elliott 14 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/move Elliott 0 -3 3/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Elliott -2 0 0/move Elliott 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Elliott 3/speak Elliott "你好，@！见到你真是惊喜！#$b#我刚奋笔疾书了八小时，正想来这里休息一下。$h"/pause 400/faceDirection Elliott 1/speak Elliott "酒保！请来两杯最好的麦芽酒！^酒保！我要你们最好的麦芽酒。再给这位女士来杯葡萄酒！"/faceDirection Gus 3/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Gus "……$u"/move Gus 3 0 0/move Gus 0 -1 0/faceDirection Emily 2/playSound openBox/pause 400/playSound Milking/move Pam -6 0 0/move Gus 0 1 3/move Gus -5 0 2/faceDirection Elliott 0/pause 500/speak Gus "给您，先生。$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Elliott 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "$q 28376 null#等等。让我们举杯庆祝一下！致……#$r 28376 25 event_toast4#致鹈鹕镇！#$r 28376 50 event_toast2#致我们的友谊！#$r 28376 -10 event_toast1#致我的健康！#$r 28376 -50 event_toast3#致你在劫难逃！"/faceDirection Elliott 2/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 900/showFrame Elliott 16/animate Elliott false false 120 16 17 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 18 17 16/pause 500/farmerEat 346/pause 900/pause 1100/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Elliott "*打嗝*……劲儿好大啊……$h"/pause 800/animate Elliott false false 400 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 20 21 22 21 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/animate farmer false true 100 102 103/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 600/stopAnimation farmer/end warpOut
Entries.96/f Gus 1000/f Pam 500/p Gus: jaunty/10 21/farmer -100 -100 0 Gus 10 21 2 Pam -101 -101 0/skippable/pause 200/emote Gus 28/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 14 24/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1 true/move farmer 0 -3 3/speak Gus "哦，好伙计，欢迎。^你好，@。"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 2/move farmer -3 0 2/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 700/speak Gus "*叹气*……我正在查看上个月的营收……情况不是很好，@。$s#$b#最麻烦的是……是因为潘姆……她已经好几个星期没付账了！我不想这样子说，因为她是我的朋友……$s#$b#……但我没办法向她开口。我知道她会为自己辩解，而且我不想伤害她的自尊心。$s"/pause 600/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "@，你得帮帮我！$s"/stopMusic/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Pam 14 24/move Pam 0 -3 3/faceDirection Gus 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/emote Gus 16/speak Pam "嘿！$h#$b#格斯……我快渴死了，给我拿点儿喝的。"/emote Gus 28/speak Gus "额……好吧，潘姆。$s"/emote Gus 28/pause 700/emote Pam 8/pause 400/speak Pam "$q 207 null#@，你在这儿干嘛？#$r 207 -50 event_credit1#你现在就得把赊的账给结了！#$r 208 15 event_credit2#酒吧在经济上有些困难。"/pause 400/faceDirection Pam 1/emote Pam 12/speak Pam "……$u#$b#*叹气*……好吧，我觉得我最好还是把帐给结了。$s"/move Pam -2 0 0/move Pam 0 -1 3/move Pam -2 0 2/faceDirection Gus 0/faceDirection farmer 3/playSound money/pause 500/speak Gus "谢谢你，潘姆！$h"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "还要谢谢你，@。$u"/pause 500/faceDirection Gus 0/speak Gus "潘姆，我现在就给你拿喝的。$h"/friendship Gus 50/end dialogue Gus "谢谢你的帮助，@。有了这些钱，酒吧就得救了。"

event_advice1#把女人当男人一样对待"/speed Emily 4/move Emily -6 0 2/speed Emily 2/move Emily 0 4 2/doAction 4 16/playSound openBox/stopMusic/move Emily 0 3 1/move Emily 1 0 2/move Emily 0 1 3/pause 400/pause 2/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 2/speak Emily "嗨，@。"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Clint "额……*清嗓子* 谢……谢谢，艾米丽。谢谢你……给我点单。#$b#那个，艾米丽？我……*咽口水*……我在想……$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/emote Emily 8/pause 400/speak Emily "克林特，怎么了？$u"/pause 500/emote Clint 28/pause 1200/speak Clint "……算了，没什么。$s"/faceDirection Clint 0/playMusic sadpiano/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 2/pause 300/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 500/move Emily 0 -1 1/move Emily 1 0 1/faceDirection Shane 3/speak Emily "嗨，谢恩！这是你的饮料。$h"/pause 300/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 400/addObject 8 17 346 1/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/faceDirection Shane 3/pause 300/faceDirection Clint 1/speak Shane "谢谢，艾米丽！$h#$b#那么……这会儿忙吗？"/speak Emily Entries.911526/f Alex 2500/t 1900 2200/n joshMes: gusviolin/-1000 -1000/farmer 5 5 1 Gus 10 6 2 Alex 9 5 3 Emily 9 17 2/skippable/showFrame 117/showFrame Alex 39/positionOffset farmer 12 8/positionOffset Alex -12 0/animate Gus false true 723 16 17/viewport 7 4 true/pause 23000/stopAnimation Gus/pause 1000/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Alex "谢谢你，格斯。这太棒了。"/move Gus 0 1 1/move Gus 1 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/doAction 11 9/move Gus 0 3 1/move Gus 12 0 3 true/speak Alex "这里真不错……我从没在这儿吃过饭。"/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "嗯，总之……我预订了这个包间，是为了和你聊聊……$l"/warp Emily 11 11 true/playSound woodyStep/move Emily 0 -4 3/move Emily -4 0 0/move Emily 0 -1 0/speak Emily "我端来了@先生的扁意面配奶油蘑菇酱。^这是给这位女士的甘蓝胡桃沙拉。#$b#……还有亚历克斯的烤牛排。^还有这位先生的烤牛排。"/playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/speak Alex "谢谢。"/move Emily 4 0 2/move Emily 0 5 1/move Emily 11 0 1 true/speak Alex "那么，我想说的就是……$9"/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Alex "*咽口水*$s"/pause 600/speak Alex "那个……第一次见到你的时候，我就被你吸引了。我有点儿不好开口……但我从没对别人有过这种感觉。$l^第一次见到你的时候，我就觉得你好漂亮。$l#$b#我一直在告诉自己“你不能对别的男孩儿有这种感觉”。$l^一般情况下，就算我对某人动了心，那种感觉很快也会冷却……$l"/pause 800/speak Alex "……但我的内心有不同的看法。^……但对你的感觉却越来越强。$l"/pause 400/emote Alex 40/pause 600/question fork1 "#我对你有同样的感觉。#抱歉……我对你没感觉。"/pause 400/fork rejectJosh/speak Alex "……$l#$b#我不敢相信，对彼此说出这番话，居然要花这么长时间。$l"/emote Alex 32/pause 800/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/speak Alex "嗯……这块牛排好棒。你能闻到香辣酱的味道吗？$10"/eyes 1 -4000/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite alexDiningDog/playSound dogWhining/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 6000/end dialogue Alex "……$l"
Entries.rejectJosh: pause 100/playMusic none/shake Alex 2000/emote Alex 28/speak Alex "……噢……$s#$b#如……如果让你不舒服了的话真是抱歉……$s"/pause 2000/speak Alex "我不是很饿了……$s"/viewport move 1 1 5000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 4000/end dialogue Alex "……$l"
Entries.195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f S: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/pause 1000/message "不知为何，你决定把手放到口袋里……"/pause 500/message "你摸着兔子的脚，感觉如释重负……"/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "嘿！"/textAboveHead Alex "最近好吗？"/textAboveHead Shane "哦，你好。"/pause 2000/move farmer 3 0 1/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Harvey "你来得正是时候，刚好赶上鹈鹕镇第一届桌球锦标赛！"/pause 500/speak Elliott "别担心，我以前也没玩过。$h"/pause 500/speak Shane "很简单的，你只管猛击母球就对了……$h"/pause 500/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/message "你和男孩们玩了一局桌球。"/pause 1000/message "毫无悬念，塞巴斯蒂安赢了……不过还是很有趣！"/pause 500/end
Entries.195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f S: playful/-1000 -1000/farmer 27 19 1 Sam 36 20 1 Sebastian 37 19 2 Harvey 39 19 2 Shane 40 17 2 Elliott 41 19 2 Alex 42 20 3/animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20/move farmer 5 0 1 true/viewport 37 19 true/move false/pause 500/startJittering/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 2000/stopAnimation farmer/showFrame farmer 0/stopJittering/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 3 true/showFrame farmer 7 true/startJittering/faceDirection Sam 3 true/faceDirection Elliott 3 true/faceDirection Harvey 3 true/faceDirection Alex 3 true/faceDirection Shane 3 true/faceDirection Sebastian 3 true/textAboveHead Sam "别跑那么快！"/textAboveHead Alex "别动！"/textAboveHead Shane "站住！"/pause 3000/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 6 true/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/move farmer 3 0 1/playMusic none/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speak Sam "呵，从没想过你所有的“男朋友”会出现在一个房间里吧，@？$a"/pause 500/speak Harvey "你骗取了我们所有人的爱……你真是太可怕了……$s^@……我还以为你想要和我结婚，共同组建家庭……我到底做错了什么？$s"/pause 500/speak Shane "我最后仅存的一丝希望也彻底被毁了……可真得谢谢你啊，@。你现在高兴了吗？$s"/pause 500/speak Alex "@？我以为……我以为我们是“彼此的唯一”……你却只是在利用我？$s^你盯着*我*看什么？你以为我会来帮你开脱？$a"/pause 500/speak Elliott "唯独这次，我竟无话可说……$a"/pause 500/playMusic wedding/speak Sam "我们不会再忍受你的伤害了！$a^现在，我们都知道真相了！我们不会容忍这种事情！$a"/textAboveHead Alex "没错！"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嗯？你还有什么要为自己辩解的？$a"/pause 1000/question fork1 "#对不起……我以前做错了。#各位，冷静一下！我可以解释……"/fork choseToExplain/pause 500/textAboveHead Alex "果然……"/pause 500/speak Shane "说得好听，但这事不能就这么算了……$a"/pause 1000/playMusic none/speak Sam "……我们已经决定了……对吗，兄弟们？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "……是的。$s"/speak Elliott "当然。$a"/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我们都要孤立你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 3/end warpOut
Entries.choseToExplain: pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "我深表怀疑……"/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork2 "#你们所有人都在逼我！让我没办法拒绝！#皮埃尔逼我干的！他想卖出更多花束！#（开始哭）"/pause 100/fork crying/textAboveHead Sam "骗子！"/textAboveHead Alex "对，没错！"/speak Elliott "不要把自己的错误归咎在别人身上！你这样只会继续失去我们的尊重……$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/speak Sam "……我们已经决定了……对吗，兄弟们？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "……是的。$s"/speak Sebastian "当然。$a"/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我们都要孤立你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut
Entries.crying: pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/emote farmer 28/pause 1000/emote Harvey 12 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/emote Shane 12 true/emote Sam 12 true/emote Elliott 12 true/emote Alex 12 true/speak Harvey "没用的！这次别想再骗取我们的同情了！$a"/speak Alex "在我看来你只是又演了一场戏……$a^不出所料……$a"/pause 100/speak Sebastian "你需要为自己做过的事负责……$a"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 2/playMusic none/speak Sam "……我们已经决定了……对吗，兄弟们？$u"/pause 500/speak Harvey "……是的。$s"/speak Sebastian "当然。$a"/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/jump Sam/jump Sebastian/jump Elliott/jump Shane/jump Alex/jump Harvey/pause 1000/speak Sam "我们都要孤立你！$a"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/playSound slimedead/pause 2000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/dump guys 4/end warpOut
Entries.wewereworried: emote farmer 40/faceDirection Marnie 1/pause 1000/faceDirection Shane 2/emote Shane 12/speak Shane "我是你的丈夫……你应该相信我。我一直对你坦诚地告诉你我的问题。$a#$b#那个……我知道我还没从强行戒酒瘾中缓过来……但是，我在努力做到最好……而且我也健康多了。#$b#我的生活已经比以前好太多了。我已经不再身处黑暗了……"/pause 500/emote Marnie 20 true/emote farmer 20 true/pause 1300/faceDirection Shane 0/speak Shane "说起来，我玩这个游戏的时候，我会专注到没心思想别的事情。当我有“邪念”的时候这确实很有帮助……"/faceDirection Shane 2/speak Shane "总之……我就……呃……再玩一局就回家。行吗？"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end dialogue Shane "你们刚才进来看到我在街机前面的时候，肯定很疑惑吧！$h"
Entries.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "干得好！"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "进球！"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "走起来！"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "好样的！"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "嘿，@！你来了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "所以……你觉得呢？"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "我一直在想……你知道我以前经常梦想有一天成为运动员吗？#$b#唔，最终结果是跟我想的有些不一样……$9#$b#不过别误会了！我还是很开心的！$h#$b#……但是我希望能有一个地方可以让我们大家一起看周日的比赛。格斯非常喜欢这个主意，他把他房子的里屋的一部分借我了！#$b#这样，我就可以用简单的办法，来保持我的“梦想”。"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "你做得很好，孩子。我本来是可以在家里看的，但来这里让我感觉自己又年轻了！$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "谢谢，爷爷。"/pause 500/speak Kent "我很高兴能有个借口离开家，让我能够喘口气。"/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "我也一样"/pause 1200/speak Gus "我很开心。而且它对生意也有好处！$h#$b#虽然可能对谢恩的肝脏不太好……$s"/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "嘿！"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "看来在星期天伙计们有了一个新的常驻活动。"/pause 1000/message "5000 金花得很值！"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "再次感谢你的出资，@。对我来说这是一个有趣的方案，并且看起来大伙都很高兴！"
Entries.3206194/n gusGiantOmelet: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 02 Gus 10 21 2 Willy 13 21 3 Lewis 8 22 1 Robin 9 20 2 Pam 11 20 2 Marnie 9 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite LooseSprites\\Cursors2 145 193 32 28 10 20.75 8 .15/viewport 11 21 true/pause 3000/speak Gus "唔，伙计们……我们这次聚在一起又是因为一个很特殊的情况。"/pause 500/speak Gus "……一位好朋友难得到访……"/pause 500/jump Gus/pause 400/speak Gus "……它就是我举世闻名的巨型煎蛋卷！$h#$b#爽口的甜椒、多汁的番茄、口感丰富的蘑菇、香浓的芝士……全部包裹在香软的煎蛋里。来吃吧，伙计们。"/move Marnie 1 0 0/move Willy -1 0 3/move Lewis 1 0 1/showFrame Lewis 28/playSound coin/showFrame Willy 32/showFrame Robin 37/showFrame Pam 36/pause 600/shake Lewis 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 600/playSound eat/pause 800/shake Robin 600/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Pam 400/playSound eat/pause 700/faceDirection Gus 1/speak Gus "威利？你觉得如何？"/pause 400/textAboveHead Willy "唔……"/pause 700/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/shake Willy 400/playSound eat/pause 600/speak Willy "蘑菇比去年的更有嚼劲一点……"/pause 400/speak Gus "你觉得好吃吗？$s"/pause 400/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 600/playSound eat/shake Willy 400/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 1300/textAboveHead Willy "是的，伙计"/pause 300/jump Gus/pause 400/emote Gus 32/pause 1000/speak Pam "很棒啊，格斯。而且因为不收钱，味道更好了！$h"/faceDirection Gus 2/speak Robin "鸡蛋口感很棒，颜色也是金黄金黄的……玛妮，是你家里的吗？"/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Gus "不是……你得感谢%farm农场的@！"/emote Lewis 20 true/emote Marnie 20 true/emote Robin 20 true/emote Pam 20 true/emote Willy 20 true/pause 1000/speak Marnie "嗯……%farm的鸡蛋。"/pause 200/textAboveHead Lewis "嗯……"/faceDirection Gus 2/viewport move 1 0 7000/pause 500/playSound eat/shake Robin 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Lewis 400/pause 1000/playSound eat/shake Marnie 400/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.95/e 93/k 94/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 2: 50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0 Kent 3 15 1/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/pause 300/faceDirection Kent 2/speak Kent "嗨，@。快进来吧。"/move farmer 0 -3 0/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/speak Jodi "啊，你能来真是太好了，@！你还带了鱼来！棒极了！"/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Kent 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "山姆！你进来帮我收拾下鱼好吗？"/pause 300/speak Sam "……遵命。$a"/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 500/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/speak Jodi "哇，看来很棒的样子……闻起来也很新鲜呢！多谢你带来的礼物，@。#$b#肯特也抓到一条鱼，不过那个给他自己吃都不一定够！$u"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/speak Kent "嘿嘿。$h"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "唔……这鲈鱼真是脆！面包糠也糊得恰到好处！"/pause 500/message "现在感觉我几乎成为这个家里的一员了。"/pause 1500/end warpOut
Entries.94/e 93/k 95/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 1: 50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/speak Jodi "啊，你好@！进来吧！这是鱼的味道吗？"/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/speak Jodi "山姆！进来帮我准备下晚饭好吗？"/pause 300/speak Sam "……遵命。$a"/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 300/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/pause 400/speak Jodi "哇，真是条肥美鲜活的鲈鱼，@。多谢你带来的礼物。$h"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "唔……这鲈鱼真是脆！面包糠也糊得十分完美！"/pause 500/message "现在感觉我几乎成为这个家里的一员了。"/pause 1500/end warpOut
Entries.44/f Sam 500/p Sam: sampractice/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 15 1 Sam 17 16 2 Sebastian 18 18 0/positionOffset Sebastian 32 -31/skippable/animate Sam false true 200 20 21/showFrame Sebastian 41/viewport 17 16 true/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 500/doAction 12 14/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 9000/stopAnimation Sam/showFrame Sebastian 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 800/speak Sam "啊，你好@！塞巴斯蒂安和我正“玩音乐”呢。"/move farmer 0 3 1/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sam "我们想组建一支乐队，但是不知道创作哪种类型的音乐比较好。选择实在太多了。"/pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 500/emote Sam 16/faceDirection Sam 3/speak Sam "#$q 76 null#你来说，@……你喜欢什么样的音乐？#$r 76 50 Event_band1#令人愉悦的流行乐。#$r 77 50 Event_band2#实验性质的硬摇滚。#$r 78 50 Event_band3#极富能量的舞曲。#$r 79 50 Event_band4#气氛活跃的乡村音乐。"/move Sam 0 2 1/speak Sam "你觉得呢，塞巴斯蒂安？我们就做这个？"/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 3/speak Sebastian "……好。"/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 0/move Sam 0 -2 3/speak Sam "多谢帮助，@。我高超的吉他技术，加上塞巴斯蒂安神乎其技的电子琴弹奏。我们一定会大获成功的！一定会！$h"/faceDirection Sam 2/speak Sam "只需要再找个打架子鼓的就好了……$u"/pause 500/end
Entries.46/f Sam 1000/p Sam: playful/7 4/farmer 7 12 0 Sam 7 5 0 Jodi 17 7 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -6 0/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 300/speak Sam "啊，你好！@。我正想吃点东西呢。"/pause 500/speak Sam "来，让我给你拿点东西吃吧。"/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3/playSound dwop/specificTemporarySprite dropEgg/showFrame Sam 33/jump Sam/pause 1000/emote Sam 12/showFrame Sam 12/speak Sam "糟糕……真是一团乱。$s"/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi -10 0 0/speak Jodi "刚刚那是什么声音？"/emote Jodi 16/speak Jodi "*吸气 *$s"/move Jodi -1 0 0/move Jodi 0 -1 0/speak Jodi "简直太可怕了！发生了什么？$u"/speak Sam "$q 80 null#……告诉她吧，@。$s#$r 80 -10 event_snack1#山姆把零食递给我的时候掉到了地上。#$r 80 50 event_snack2#山姆把零食递给我，然后被我弄掉了。#$r 81 -50 event_snack3#山姆故意弄掉的。他觉得这样很好玩。"/pause 300/speak Jodi "$p 80#谢谢你告诉我真相，@。不是什么大事。|山姆，你干了“什么”？！你这是犯什么病了？！$u"/faceDirection Jodi 0/speak Sam "真是对不起，妈。我这就打扫干净。$s"/emote Jodi 20/speak Jodi "谢了，亲爱的。$h"/move Jodi 0 1 1/move Jodi 1 0 2 /faceDirection Sam 2 true/move Jodi 0 7 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Sam "$p 81#你这样我很生气。我不知道你为什么要这样撒谎。$s|之前的事很抱歉。"

Entries.67/m 10: none/4 5/farmer 4 9 0 Sandy 2 5 2/skippable/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote Sandy 8/speak Sandy "有……顾客？"/speed Sandy 4/move Sandy 2 0 2/speed Sandy 4/move Sandy 0 1 2/emote Sandy 16/speak Sandy "嗨！你好！欢迎来到‘桑迪的绿洲’！#$b#你看起来很像艾米丽给我写的信里那个新来的农夫嘛！#$b#那么……前往星露谷的公交线路又开张啦！$h#$b#哦，我好高兴啊！$h"/emote Sandy 32/move Sandy 0 -1 0/move Sandy -2 0 2/emote Sandy 32/end dialogue Sandy "请经常来光顾哦，我在这里很无聊的。"

Entries.6/f Maru 500/p Maru: breezy/20 19/farmer 9 20 1 Maru 22 20 1 Demetrius 19 18 0 Robin 13 6 0 Sebastian -100 -100 2/skippable/move farmer 7 0 1/faceDirection Maru 3/faceDirection Demetrius 3/speak Maru "啊，你好！"/move farmer 1 0 1/speak Maru "我和我爸正对土壤样本进行测试呢。"/pause 800/emote farmer 40/speak Maru "不要害羞嘛！我们正缺人手呢。$h"/move farmer 4 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Maru "能帮我看一下这个烧杯吗？我去取最后一批样本。#$b#我去去就回。"/pause 400/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 1 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 0/speed Maru 4/move Maru -16 0 3/speed Maru 4/move Maru 0 3 2/move Maru 0 1 2/warp Maru -100 -100/playSound doorClose/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Demetrius "多谢你的帮助，@。"/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 0/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/speak Demetrius "玛鲁是个乖孩子。她可是我的宝贝女儿……"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/stopMusic/pause 800/speak Demetrius "我可不希望有什么东西妨碍到她光明的未来，你懂我的意思吧？$5"/pause 400/faceDirection farmer 3/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Demetrius 0/speak Demetrius "平时多想想这事吧……*轻笑*$h"/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 6 24/playMusic kindadumbautumn/move Maru 0 -4 1/emote farmer 40 true/move Maru 3 0 1/faceDirection farmer 1 true/move Maru 8 0 1/speak Maru "啊，真是抱歉了。在我不在的时候你们有话题聊吧？"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Demetrius 3/pause 500/speak Demetrius "……我刚刚在和@说我们测试的土壤样本的事。"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/speak Demetrius "$q 15933 null#我说的没错吧，@？#$r 15933 10 Event_Lab_Silence#（什么也不说）#$r 15933 -100 Event_Lab_Rat#其实，你爸刚刚可神秘了。"/fork DadWeird/pause 500/speak Maru "好的！那么，@……我来告诉你如何使用仪器。"/move Maru 4 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 2/move Maru 0 1 1/move Maru 1 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/end Maru1
Entries.DadWeird: speak Maru "哈？爸，你跟他说什么了？$a^哈？爸，你跟她说什么了？$a"/pause 500/faceDirection Demetrius 2/emote Demetrius 28/speak Demetrius "好啦，好啦……我们在说你啊，小宝贝。$5#$b#我想和@说说你的事……但是又怕你难为情……我不该对你说谎的。$s"/faceDirection Demetrius 0/pause 300/emote Maru 28/move Maru 2 0 0/speak Maru "没事的，爸爸。我能理解的。#$b#趁样本还没结晶我们最好赶紧回去工作。"/faceDirection Demetrius 2/emote Demetrius 32/move Maru 3 0 1/faceDirection Demetrius 0/faceDirection farmer 1/end Maru1

Entries.25/f Demetrius 1500/p Demetrius/p Robin: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer -10 -10 0 Demetrius 6 21 3 Robin 5 21 1/skippable/showFrame Demetrius 28/viewport 6 21 true/pause 900/speak Robin "德米特里厄斯，我跟你说的是拿水果来。不是拿西红柿来。"/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "真是搞不懂。西红柿就是水果啊！"/emote Robin 12/speak Robin "只要是正常人，说想要水果的时候，要的都绝对不会是西红柿的。这与西红柿在科学上的分类无关。"/warp farmer 6 24/playSound doorClose/pause 500/showFrame Demetrius 29/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Demetrius "@！你来的正好。你帮我们解决这个争端最合适不过了。"/move farmer 0 -2 0/emote farmer 8/speak Demetrius "$q 59 null#你觉得西红柿该分到哪类？#$r 59 -30 Event_tomato1#蔬菜#$r 59 50 Event_tomato2#水果"/pause 500/showFrame Demetrius 28/speak Demetrius "我只想告诉你我的观点。#$b#每次你跟我说些什么的时候，我都感觉很难做出推断呢。"/pause 300/faceDirection Robin 1/pause 300/speak Demetrius "但我会尽力做到更好的。"/pause 600/emote Robin 20/pause 300/showFrame Demetrius 29/pause 600/speak Demetrius "谢谢你的帮助，@。$h"/pause 800/end

Entries.1053978/n robinDeluxeBed: distantBanjo/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Robin 5 20 3 Demetrius 7 20 3 Maru 8 18 2 Sebastian 3 23 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite staticSprite TileSheets\\furniture 160 1087 48 64 2.25 18/positionOffset Robin 32 0/viewport 5 22 true/pause 3000/speak Robin "瞧！我的最新作品。$h#$b#是一张用优质本地硬木打造的豪华四柱帷幔床。"/pause 400/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "呃……罗宾？这四根柱子有什么用？我觉得这是在浪费材料。$s"/emote Robin 12/faceDirection Robin 1/speak Robin "老兄，这是“美观”……你说，是不是大家看着都觉得赏心悦目？$6"/emote Demetrius 8/speak Demetrius "唔，我明白你的意思了。不过也不能为了美观影响了这个睡觉容器的实用性和效率啊。"/pause 500/jump Robin/pause 500/speak Robin "我说，有的时候你感觉像是在装傻充愣，就为了惹恼我。是这样吗？$3"/pause 100/animate Demetrius true true 100 18/shake Demetrius 1000/emote Maru 28 true/emote Sebastian 12 true/jump Demetrius/pause 1000/stopAnimation Demetrius/pause 400/warp farmer 6 24/playSound doorClose/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection Robin 2 true/faceDirection Demetrius 2 true/faceDirection Sebastian 1/speak Robin "嘿，@……进来吧。"/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Robin "看看这个……多亏你收集了那么多硬木，我才能做出来这张床。"/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Robin 3 true/faceDirection Demetrius 3/pause 300/speak Robin "你觉得怎么样？"/quickQuestion #美学设计棒极了#四根柱子看起来有点浪费(break)faceDirection Sebastian 0 true\textAboveHead Sebastian "嗯"\emote Robin 20 true\emote Demetrius 12\pause 2000\move Demetrius 15 0 1 true\pause 500\speak Demetrius "*咳咳*……呃……如果有人要找我，去狗窝里找就行……$5"(break)emote Demetrius 32\speak Demetrius "英雄所见略同……$h"\emote Robin 12 \speak Robin "随便你们了。$3#$b#我继续……$3"/pause 1000/speak Robin "既然我把原型做出来了，那就可以在店里卖了。"/faceDirection Robin 2/speak Robin "嘿，@……这些可能很适合你的屋子！你觉得呢……要买几张吗？"/faceDirection farmer 2 true/startJittering/animate farmer false true 100 94/jump farmer/pause 200/textAboveHead Maru "妈妈！"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.2794460/f Sebastian 500/p Sebastian: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 9 4 3 Robin -100 -100 2/skippable/doAction 1 3/removeTile 1 3 Buildings/removeTile 1 2 Front/playSound keyboardTyping/showFrame Sebastian 24/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27 26 27 26 27 26/viewport 6 6 true/move farmer 0 4 1/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "哦，嗨。稍等一下。"/pause 500/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 1000/question fork1 "#他很忙……我还是走吧。#待在原地。"/fork didntLeave/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Sebastian "你要去哪儿？$u"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "抱歉……我得在思路被打断之前，把这一行搞定。"/pause 500/move farmer 2 0 1/switchEvent sebastianRoom
Entries.didntLeave: pause 5500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "好了。真是抱歉，我要先把手头的事情搞定。"/switchEvent sebastianRoom
Entries.sebastianRoom: resetVariable/move farmer 0 2 1/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 3 0 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/question fork1 "#问问他刚刚在干什么。#称赞他房间的装饰。"/fork decor/pause 500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "我有时候会接一些编程的零活。"/switchEvent enterRobin
Entries.decor: pause 500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "装饰？哦，对哦……谢谢了。我在墙上贴海报已经贴好多年了。可能有点乱。"/switchEvent enterRobin
Entries.enterRobin: pause 500/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "是山姆的短信……看来他是想找我出去玩……#$b#呃，我今天不太想出门。$u"/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Robin 1 1/move Robin 0 4 1/speak Robin "啊，你好！@。"/faceDirection farmer 3/move Robin 4 0 1/speak Robin "塞比，我知道你不想让我进来……但我今天遇到了阿比盖尔，她说她在找你。"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "你有没有和她说我在工作？"/speak Robin "说了……不过她说她可能还是要来。"/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "*叹气*……大家都不把我的工作当回事儿。$u#$b#玛鲁在诊所工作的时候就没人去打扰她……难道大家以为我整天就是在网上冲浪吗？"/faceDirection farmer 0 true/move Robin -4 0 0/move Robin 0 -4 0/warp Robin -100 -100/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/resetVariable/question fork1 "#问问他对前途的打算。#问问他为什么不想见到朋友。"/fork noFriends/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嗯，我是想攒钱搬家。搬到城里什么的。"/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "我要是上了大学，现在怎么也赚到六位数了……但我并不想进入企业，永无休止地跟人竞争，你懂吧？#$b#看来，与其让我和人面对面相处，还是躲藏在屏幕后面要舒服得多啊。$s"/emote Sebastian 28/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/speak Sebastian "我得继续工作了……明天之前要把这个模块完成才行。"/animate Sebastian false true 100 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 25 26 27 26 27 26 27 26 25 24 24/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.noFriends: pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "*叹气*……我喜欢和朋友相处，但也需要许多时间来独处，要跟社交之类的东西保持平衡。$s#$b#山姆则正好相反……一个人待太久，会让他发疯的。#$b#也许正是因为这个，我才如此喜欢电脑……电脑充满魅力，直截了当，又很无私。在我认识的人里面，没几个有这样的品格。"/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "我得继续工作了……明天之前要把这个模块完成才行。"/pause 300/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
Entries.27/f Sebastian 1500/p Sebastian: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 5 9 3 Sam 3 7 2/skippable/showFrame Sam 24/showFrame Sebastian 28/doAction 1 3/viewport 5 5 true/move farmer 0 6 1/pause 500/showFrame Sebastian 29/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嘿，@。$7"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "山姆和我正打算玩《索拉里昂英雄传奇：游戏版》……要不要加入我们？三个人一起更好玩。$7"/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 1 true/showFrame 117/positionOffset farmer 16 80/pause 600/speak Sebastian "好，开始了……让我来抽取一张情景卡。$7"/pause 900/showFrame Sebastian 30/playSound dwoop/pause 500/showFrame Sebastian 28/pause 500/speak Sebastian "唔……看来今天的任务是进入死灵法师之塔……从恐怖领主萨尔斯的手中夺回索拉里昂法杖。"/pause 600/speak Sam "真不错……@，准备好选择你的角色了吗？"/pause 500/question chooseCharacter "选择你的角色：#战士。我喜欢直截了当。#牧师。我喜欢帮助他人。#法师。唯有敏锐的头脑才是最锋利的武器。"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嘿！我本来还想选这个呢！$h#$b#看来我只好当牧师了。"/pause 500/speak Sam "好啊。反正我最喜欢战士了。"/addMailReceived choseWizard/switchEvent opening
Entries.warrior: pause 500/speak Sebastian "真是明智的选择。新手最适合玩战士了。$7#$b#那我就选法师好了。"/emote Sam 28/speak Sam "那我只好选牧师了。$s"/addMailReceived choseWarrior/switchEvent opening
Entries.healer: pause 500/speak Sebastian "牧师吗？那可是个很重要的角色啊。$7#$b#那我就选法师好了。"/speak Sam "好啊。反正我最喜欢战士了。"/addMailReceived choseHealer/switchEvent opening
Entries.opening: pause 500/speak Sebastian "我们开始吧……"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic Crystal Bells/cutscene boardGame/pause 1700/message "国王派你和你的同伴前去取回索拉里昂法杖……如果能够成功，你们的大名将流芳百世，还会获得数不完花不尽的金银财宝。"/pause 800/message "经过一个月的长途跋涉后，你登上了一座悬崖，隐约发现你的目标就坐落在前方。"/pause 100/message "在那月光照耀的平原对面，就是死灵法师塔……在塔里，恐怖领主萨尔斯正从他偷来的索拉里昂法杖中汲取能量，以实现自己邪恶的计划。"/pause 500/pause 700/updateMinigame 1/resetVariable/pause 700/question fork1 "塔就矗立在你的面前。#从正门进入。不入虎穴焉得虎子。#寻找后门，以免打草惊蛇。"/fork backEntrance/pause 500/updateMinigame 3/pause 50/playSound skeletonStep/pause 100/playMusic bigDrums/pause 500/message "一个骷髅拦住了你的去路。它似乎很难对付。"/pause 900/resetVariable/question fork1 "你要怎么办？#与骷髅对战。#逃跑。"/fork ranAway/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork0 "骷髅冲了过来！#挥动武器。#举起盾牌。"/fork swungWeapons/pause 600/playSound clubhit/updateMinigame -1/pause 500/message "你成功挡下了攻击。骷髅向后倒退了几步，你趁机冲上去，一击了结了这可怕的生物。"/pause 200/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound skeletonDie/updateMinigame 5/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/addMailReceived killedSkeleton/message "你们小心翼翼地绕开骷髅的遗骸，沿着走廊继续前进。"/pause 900/switchEvent sewer
Entries.swungWeapons: pause 300/message "骷髅的行动太快，你们还没来得及发动进攻，就已经中招了！"/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "巨大的力量将你和你的同伴向后抛去。你们立足不稳，滚下了一道陡峭的斜坡，掉进了一个湿乎乎的地方。"/pause 100/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 700/switchEvent sewer
Entries.ranAway: pause 300/message "你们沿着昏暗的走廊左绕右转。冰冷的石头坡道和螺旋楼梯向下延伸，仿佛无穷无尽。终于，你们进入了一片新的区域。"/pause 400/switchEvent sewer
Entries.backEntrance: pause 300/playSound leafrustle/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 400/playSound leafrustle/pause 500/updateMinigame 2/pause 600/message "在塔基附近搜索了一番之后，你在灌木丛中发现了一道木板暗门。下面是一架梯子，你和同伴走了下去。"/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/switchEvent sewer
Entries.sewer: updateMinigame 4/resetVariable/playMusic pool_ambient/pause 1600/message "你发现自己身处一个类似下水道的走廊里。左手边，一条通道散发着奇异的绿色光芒。右手边，一段楼梯升入黑暗之中。"/pause 500/question fork1 "你要怎么办？#进入左侧的通道。#登上右侧的楼梯。"/fork wizardDoor/switchEvent podRoom
Entries.podRoom: pause 500/updateMinigame 7/resetVariable/playMusic Hospital_Ambient/pause 1600/message "你站在一个房间里。左手边有一架梯子。右手边有三个囚犯悬浮在诡异的发光容器里。他们似乎正在接受某种改造。"/pause 500/message "这难道就是恐怖领主的邪恶实验吗？"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#尽快离开。#摧毁容器。"/fork leave/pause 500/pause 500/playSound swordswipe/pause 200/playSound breakingGlass/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "在让这些可怜的灵魂安息之后，你和同伴爬上了梯子。"/pause 800/addMailReceived destroyedPods/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/switchEvent wizardDoor
Entries.wizardDoor: pause 500/updateMinigame 8/resetVariable/playMusic Lava_Ambient/pause 1600/message "在通道尽头，一扇门出现在你们面前。"/pause 800/message "是时候面对恐怖领主萨尔斯了。"/pause 500/playSound openChest/pause 1000/switchEvent Necromancer
Entries.Necromancer: pause 500/updateMinigame 6/resetVariable/playMusic Lava_Ambient/pause 1600/message "萨尔斯：入侵者？你们竟敢闯入我的住所！"/pause 800/message "啊，原来你们是为了索拉里昂法杖而来……"/pause 800/message "嘿嘿嘿……真是愚蠢。你们很快就会加入我的骷髅大军！"/pause 500/fork choseWizard finalBossWizard/fork choseWarrior finalBossWarrior/message "恐怖领主萨尔斯射出暗影光线！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 800/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "你躲开了法术，但你的同伴却受了重伤！"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#治疗战士（山姆）。#治疗法师（塞巴斯蒂安）。"/pause 500/fork healedSam/playSound healSound/pause 500/speak Sebastian "非常感谢。@。$7"/speak Sam "……$s"/pause 1000/playMusic none/message "塞巴斯蒂安放出“净化之箭”……一道白光径直击中了萨尔斯的脸。恐怖领主尖叫着化为了灰烬。"/playSound debuffSpell/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "你捡起了索拉里昂法杖，将其高高举起，世界恢复了秩序。"/addMailReceived savedFriends/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.healedSam: playSound healSound/pause 500/speak Sam "非常感谢。@。"/speak Sebastian "……$s"/pause 1000/playMusic none/message "山姆冲上去砍倒了萨尔斯，将索拉里昂法杖从他手中夺回，和平与秩序重返人间。"/pause 500/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.finalBossWizard: pause 500/resetVariable/message "恐怖领主萨尔斯在低声吟诵咒语……"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#对萨尔斯施放“净化光束”。#为同伴施放“护盾术”。"/fork castBeam/pause 800/playSound debuffHit/message "你给山姆和塞巴斯蒂安施加了“护盾术”。"/pause 500/playSound debuffSpell/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "萨尔斯射出数道黑暗能量。其中一道击中了塞巴斯蒂安，却被你的“护盾术”弹回，打中了他自己的脸！"/pause 800/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "萨尔斯被击败了，索拉里昂法杖散发着柔和的光芒。世界恢复了秩序！"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/addMailReceived savedFriends/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.castBeam: pause 500/message "你还没来得及施展法术，萨尔斯就对你的同伴射出了一道暗影光束！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 500/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "山姆和塞巴斯蒂安被烧成了焦炭……"/pause 500/playSound yoba/pause 800/message "你的法术正中萨尔斯的面门。"/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/message "他尖叫着化为了灰烬。你捡起了索拉里昂法杖，将其高高举起，和平与秩序重返人间。"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.chargeAhead: pause 500/message "你向前冲去，但萨尔斯却绕过了你，对你的同伴施放了暗影光束！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 500/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "山姆和塞巴斯蒂安被烧成了焦炭……"/pause 800/message "你再次挥起利剑，结结实实地击中了萨尔斯，他尖叫着化为了灰烬。"/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "你捡起了索拉里昂法杖，将其高高举起。秩序与和平重返人间。"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.finalBossWarrior: pause 500/resetVariable/message "恐怖领主萨尔斯在低声吟诵咒语……"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#挥舞着长剑冲上去。#用你的盾保护同伴。"/fork chargeAhead/pause 1200/message "萨尔斯对塞巴斯蒂安施放了“暗影箭”……但你及时举起了盾牌，弹开了攻击！"/pause 500/playSound debuffSpell/pause 400/playSound parry/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "在萨尔斯准备再次施法的间隙，你挥着剑冲上去，了结了他"/playSound swordswipe/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "索拉里昂法杖在你高举的手中散发着柔和的光芒。世界恢复了秩序！"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/addMailReceived savedFriends/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
Entries.leave: pause 500/message "将可怕的囚徒影像抛诸脑后，你和同伴飞快地爬上了梯子。"/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/switchEvent wizardDoor
Entries.end: playMusic Hospital_Ambient/pause 9000/viewport 5 5 true/pause 800/showFrame Sebastian 29/speak Sebastian "嘿，不错！$7#$b#我用了三四回才通过第一幕呢。$7"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "多谢拜访……回头见啦。$7"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end

Entries.1/f Abigail 500/p Abigail/d Sat: none/-9999 -4/farmer 13 6 3 Abigail 3 6 2/skippable/showFrame Abigail 20/specificTemporarySprite abbyvideoscreen/viewport 9 4 true/pause 1000/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/emote Abigail 52/pause 800/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/temporarySprite 2 4 27 8 50/shake Abigail 500/pause 150/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/temporarySprite 4 4 27 8 50 true/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 450/playSound Cowboy_monsterDie/pause 550/playSound Cowboy_gunshot/pause 150/playSound cowboy_dead/pause 850/emote Abigail 28/playMusic distantBanjo/showFrame Abigail 21/pause 80/showFrame Abigail 22/pause 80/move farmer -1 0 3/move farmer -3 0 3/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 200/emote Abigail 16/pause 600/speak Abigail "@？"/move farmer -3 0 3/speak Abigail "你怎么偷偷溜进我的房间，吓死我了！"/faceDirection Abigail 0/speak Abigail "*叹气*……我玩“草原之王的旅行”已经好几个小时了，却连第一关都过不去……$s#$b#这游戏难度也太夸张了吧！$a#$b#呃，要不然就是我技术太差了。$s"/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 1000/emote Abigail 16/pause 300/speak Abigail "嘿，你要不要和我一起玩玩这一关？有你帮忙应该会简单些。"/faceDirection farmer 3/farmerAnimation 97/pause 1000/faceDirection Abigail 0/move farmer 0 1 3/move farmer -4 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/globalFade/cutscene AbigailGame/pause 500/faceDirection Abigail 3/stopMusic/faceDirection farmer 1/fork beatGame/pause 600/emote Abigail 28/pause 400/speak Abigail "呃，我放弃了……看来这辈子是过不了第一关了。$s#$b#好吧……至少努力过了。"/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame 96/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/end
Entries.beatGame: playMusic jaunty/speak Abigail "嘿，挺有意思的！$h#$b#好的，谢谢。@你用手柄还真是有一套啊。这倒也说得通。$h^非常感谢。@。本没想到你玩操作杆这么娴熟！感觉像是很有经验的样子呢！$h"/pause 500/emote Abigail 32/pause 1000/end
Entries.3/f Abigail 2000/p Abigail/t 2000 2200/n: echos/-1000 -1000/farmer 13 6 3 Abigail 6 8 1/skippable/specificTemporarySprite abbyOuijaCandles/viewport 7 5/speak Abigail "嘿！我正想着你什么时候来呢。我想给你看点东西。"/move farmer -5 0 0/move farmer 0 2 3/faceDirection Abigail 2/speak Abigail "你看到了吗？这个就是通灵板。你以前用过吗？"/emote farmer 8/move Abigail 0 2 1/move farmer 0 2 3/pause 500/speak Abigail "把我们的手一起放到板子上……$l"/showFrame Abigail 30/pause 200/animate farmer true true 9999 89/pause 600/speak Abigail "现在，灵魂将把我们领向……$h"/showFrame Abigail 31/pause 500/speak Abigail "快看！在动诶！$7"/emote farmer 16/speak Abigail "第一个字母是……“我” ……"/pause 600/speak Abigail "下一个是……“<” ……"/pause 800/speak Abigail "哇，快看它动的样子！它写着……“%firstnameletter”……#$b#我 < %firstnameletter……？"/emote Abigail 16/showFrame Abigail 12/faceDirection Abigail 3/stopMusic/pause 200/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 400/specificTemporarySprite abbyOuija/playSound swordswipe/pause 900/playSound seeds/pause 500/speak Abigail "哎呀，一不留神把板子打翻了！嘻嘻……$h#$b#这就是个蠢游戏，没什么意义的啦。$9"/faceDirection Abigail 3/emote Abigail 60/faceDirection Abigail 1/speak Abigail "我，呃，还有事要做。你得走了……对不起了。$9"/faceDirection Abigail 2/emote farmer 28/pause 500/move farmer 0 -3 0/pause 800/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/move farmer 5 0 1 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end invisibleWarpOut Abigail
Entries.16/f Pierre 1500/p Pierre: Hospital_Ambient/20 5/farmer 20 12 0 Pierre 14 15 0/skippable/doAction 20 11/move farmer 0 -7 1/move farmer -1 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 600/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/showFrame 35/emote farmer 8/pause 1000/playSound secret1/stopAnimation farmer/message "你找到了皮埃尔的“秘密收藏”。"/pause 1000/speak Pierre "嘿！谁在卧室里？$4"/warp Pierre 20 12 true/faceDirection Pierre 0/playMusic ragtime/move Pierre 0 -4 0 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame 94/jump farmer/pause 1000/stopAnimation farmer/proceedPosition Pierre/emote Pierre 16/speed Pierre 4/move Pierre 0 -3 1 false/move Pierre -1 0 0/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Pierre "你……你是怎么发现的？！$4"/faceDirection Pierre 2/pause 200/faceDirection Pierre 0/speak Pierre "快给我！$u"/showFrame 95/pause 300/playSound coin/pause 600/showFrame 0/pause 500/speak Pierre "$q 50 null#发誓你不会把这事儿告诉任何人。#$r 50 70 Event_naga1#我会为你保守秘密的。#$r 50 -500 Event_naga2#这事儿应该让你太太知道。"/pause 500/speed Pierre 2/move Pierre 1 0 2/emote Pierre 12/speak Pierre "*嘟囔*……这下又得找个新的藏匿点了……*嘟囔*$u"/move Pierre 0 8 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.17/f Caroline 1500/p Caroline/p Abigail: 50s/35 9/farmer 31 13 0 Abigail 34 9 1 Caroline 35 9 3/skippable/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Abigail "不要再对我的生活指手画脚了！$a"/pause 500/speak Caroline "喂，别闹了！我们让你在读完书之前住在这里，一个钱都不花。但看样子你一点感激的意思都没有啊！$u"/emote Abigail 12/speak Abigail "不要再让我内疚了。$a#$b#有你和老爸帮忙，我真的很感激，但让我按照你们的方式生活，实在是太不可理喻了。$a#$b#我已经不是小姑娘了，妈。$u"/faceDirection Caroline 1/pause 1500/faceDirection Caroline 3/speak Caroline "……你说得对。我很抱歉。$s"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/playSound woodyStep/faceDirection Abigail 2 true/faceDirection Caroline 2/speak Abigail "有人在吗？$7"/faceDirection farmer 0/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 1 3/speed farmer 4/move farmer -4 0 2 true/move Abigail -3 0 2 false/emote Abigail 8/speak Abigail "我和你说，这屋子绝对在闹鬼。"/emote Caroline 40/pause 500/end dialogue Abigail "呃啊啊……$a#$b#抱歉……我刚才在和我妈吵架。$s"

500/speak Harvey "*喘息*……*喘息*……出了。$7"/move Pam -1 0 3 true/faceDirection Jodi 2/faceDirection Emily 1 true/viewport move 0 -1 3000/move farmer 3 0 1/faceDirection Robin 3/faceDirection Marnie 1 true/move Harvey -3 0 0/move Harvey 0 -8 3/emote Harvey 16/speak Harvey "@！你一直在看吗？$8#$b#……真是丢人……本来还想瞒着大家呢。至少也不该让你知道。$s"/move Harvey -2 0 3/speak Harvey
